@Covid19Critical At the end, a news announcer says the NIH is funding a study on IVERMECTIN safety and efficacy. What study is she talking about, specifically? Because as far as I know the NIH has declined to fund any of the many studies COMPLETED or underway of IVERMECTIN v. CoViD-19!

@aerwaves_ @chedancer @Covid19Critical Here is a listing of all the studies on IVM of many types, & a meta-analysis of the ones amenable to that method. Updated often by volunteer MDs. Tons of evidence of many types showing it is effective.

@aerwaves_ @chedancer @Covid19Critical True, mRNA vaccines don't prevent infection, but they do lessen its severity & prevent death & serious injury from the virus. Ivermectin will further reduce the severity of infection & is among the safest of FDA approved medications. Unethical for a doc to refuse to prescribe it.
